SELECT b.uid, b.type, IFNULL(SUM( CASE WHEN good_bad='G' THEN 1 END ),0) as good_cnt, IFNULL(SUM( CASE WHEN good_bad='B' THEN 1 END ),0) as bad_cnt, b.title, b.created_user, b.view_cnt, b.created_at FROM board b LEFT JOIN good_bad gb ON b.uid = gb.mother_uid WHERE is_del = 0 GROUP BY b.uid;
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET view_cnt = view_cnt + 1 WHERE uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( title, type, content, created_user, created_at ) VALUES( #{title}, #{type}, #{content}, #{created_user}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT uid, title, content, created_user, created_at, view_cnt FROM board WHERE uid = #{uid}
SELECT mother_uid, created_user, good_bad FROM good_bad WHERE mother_uid = #{mother_uid} AND created_user = #{created_user}
mapper.update: UPDATE good_bad SET good_bad = #{good_bad}, updated_at = now() WHERE mother_uid = #{mother_uid} AND created_user = #{created_user}
